animeTitle: Ghost in the Shell: Arise - Border 3
otherNames: 攻殻機動隊ARISE -GHOST IN THE SHELL- border:3 Ghost Tears
synopsis: Motoko and Batou work to try to stop a terrorist organization whose symbol is the Scylla. Meanwhile, Togusa investigates a murder of a man who possessed a prosthetic leg manufactured by the Mermaid's Leg corporation.
